summary: Ego vehicle is driving down a road with parked motorcycles on the right. A pedestrian is walking on the right side of the road. A motorcycle suddenly appears from the left side of the road, attempting to cross the street. The motorcycle collides with another motorcycle.
actions: Ego vehicle is moving forward. Pedestrian is walking. Motorcycle is crossing the street.

summary: Ego vehicle continues driving forward after witnessing a motorcycle collision. People are gathering around the scene of the accident.
actions: Ego vehicle is moving forward. People are gathering.
